content: this cute little cat squishy was designed with the help of my 6 year old she wanted something small and cute so she could squish its little face her words lol the larger cats are made using worsted weight yarn and a size 3 5mm crochet hook and measure about 4-1/2 x 4-1/2 you ll also need a removable stitch marker to keep track of the first stitch in each row as well as a needle for putting detail on the face if you re feeling brave make a mini cat by using just a small amount of size 10 thread and size 1 5mm crochet hook this one came out so adorable i think i m going to turn it into a keychain or zipper pull it measures about 2 x 2 this was designed for the 2019 softie crochet along for cal central crochet on facebook check out the group to stay in the loop for all the fabulous cal s
